SIconfronta 1.0.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

boxplot_1sample_mu()

Plotly boxplots for comparing a group of values with a reference value

boxplot_1sample_sigma()

Plotly boxplots for comparing a group of values with a reference standard deviation value

boxplot_2samples()

Plotly boxplots for comparing two groups of values

boxplot_2samples_par()

Plotly boxplots for comparing two groups of values for one of which only mean, standard deviation and number of samples are reported.

boxplot_2values_unc()

Plotly boxplots for comparing two values with extended uncertainties

fct_chitest_1sample_sigma()

Displays the results of a \(\chi^2\)-test for a group of values vs a reference standard deviation value.

fct_entest_2values_unc()

Displays the results of an \(E_n\)-test for two values with extended uncertainties

fct_ftest_2samples()

Displays the results of an \(F\)-test for two groups of values

fct_ftest_2samples_par()

Displays the results of an \(F\)-test for two groups of values for one of which only mean, standard deviation and number of samples are reported.

fct_gesd()

Displays the results of a generalised extreme studentized deviate (GESD) test

fct_shapiro()

Displays the results of a Shapiro-Wilk normality test

fct_ttest_1sample_mu()

Displays the results of a \(t\)-test for a group of values vs a known value

fct_ttest_2samples()

Displays the results of a \(t\)-test for two groups of values

fct_ttest_2samples_par()

Displays the results of a \(t\)-test for two groups of values for one of which only mean, standard deviation and number of samples are reported.

ftest_reference

F-Test data

ggboxplot_1sample_mu()

GGplot2 boxplots for comparing a group of values with a reference value

ggboxplot_1sample_sigma()

GGplot2 boxplots for comparing a group of values with a standard deviation reference value

ggboxplot_2samples()

GGplot2 boxplots for comparing two groups of values

ggboxplot_2samples_par()

GGplot2 boxplots for comparing two groups of values, for one of which only mean, standard deviation and number of samples are reported.

ggboxplot_2values_unc()

GGplot2 boxplots for comparing two values with extended uncertainties

rowsummary_1sample_mu()

Summary arranged on rows for one group vs a mean reference value

rowsummary_1sample_sigma()

Summary arranged on rows for one group vs a standard deviation reference value

rowsummary_2samples()

Summary arranged on rows for two groups

rowsummary_2samples_par()

Summary arranged on rows for two groups for one of which only mean, standard deviation and number of samples are reported.

rowsummary_2values_unc()

Summary arranged on rows for two values with their extended uncertainties

run_app()

Run the Shiny Application

shapirotest_reference

Shapiro-Wilk test data

tomato_yields

Tomato yields for two fertilizer mixtures

uniiso_16269_4_432

Observations from UNI ISO 16269-4:2019 - Section 4.3.2

uniiso_2854_x

UNI ISO 2854:1988 Section X

uranium_cps

Mass spectrometer measurements on a Uranium isotope

Contents
